item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:6, topic:75409”]Congratulations on ‘Senior Member’ Scyth. Hey this is spam, were all aloud to spam once though, right? ;)[/quote]Yes, Senior Member privilege. Didn’t you get the memo?
Memo:
[b]Dear Senior Members,
We would like to inform you that you are now allowed to spam the Forum’s as long as you keep your spam posts as useless as possible so that we can get tons of complaints from Junior Members and Members. We regret to inform you however, that if we catch the slightest bit of useful information in your spam, we will ban you, because we all know spam isn’t spam unless it’s useless spam. Congratulations Senior Members, have fun with the spam!

Sincerely,
Moparisthebest[/b]

Read full topic
